title.native: 名探偵コナン　異次元の狙撃手（スナイパー）
title.english: Case Closed: The Sniper from Another Dimension

description: Shuichi Akai is targeted by a mysterious sniper and Masumi Sera is shot. Tokyo is in panic, citizens are taken in the shooting of a sniper. Nothing is known about him. Why was Sera targeted? Will Akai survive from this? Jodie Starling and Subaru Okiya are also in this one. Will Conan be able to find and apprehend the culprit?
synonyms: Meitantei Conan Movie 18: Ijigen no Sniper
Detektiv Conan: Der Scharfschütze aus einer anderen Dimension
Detetive Conan: O Mistério do Atirador de Elite
Detective Conan Movie 18: Il cecchino da un'altra dimensione
Detective Conan: El caso del francotirador dimensional

tags.name: Detective
tags.description: Features a character who investigates and solves crimes.

tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Age Regression
tags.description: Prominently features a character who was returned to a younger state.

tags.name: Assassins
tags.description: Centers around characters who murder people as a profession.

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

title.native: 名探偵コナン
名探偵コナン 異次元の狙撃手

name.native: ジェイムズ・ブラック
ジョディ・スターリング
ティモシー・ハンター

node.description:
__Favorite Food:__ Rice with curry

Gosho Aoyama, alternatively known by his real name Yoshimasa Aoyama, is a Japanese mangaka and animator, best known as the creator of Detective Conan (internationally known as Case Closed), Magic Kaito, and YAIBA.
**Tomoko Fukunaga** is a Japanese animator and animation director.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/1178607902522654720)

Originating from Ad Cosmo. Frequent presence in the [Gundam](https://anilist.co/anime/2581/) franchise since 2007.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Minezawa)

Currently freelance. Formerly affiliated with Studio Gross.

During their time at Studio Gross they worked as an in-between animator, key animator, animation director and episode director.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/須藤昌朋)

Originating from Studio Annapuru, currently freelance.

Debuted as an in-betweener on the second season of [Ashita no Joe](https://anilist.co/anime/2921/). He is particularly known for his involvement in [TMS Entertainment's](https://anilist.co/studio/73/) works, mainly the [Detective Conan](https://anilist.co/anime/235/) franchise, in which he has served as a character designer and animation director on all of the theatrical movies.
Kouichi Oohata is a director and mecha designer best known for creating the Gunbuster from *Top wo Nerae!*

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/須藤昌朋)

Originating from Studio Annapuru, currently freelance.

Debuted as an in-betweener on the second season of [Ashita no Joe](https://anilist.co/anime/2921/). He is particularly known for his involvement in [TMS Entertainment's](https://anilist.co/studio/73/) works, mainly the [Detective Conan](https://anilist.co/anime/235/) franchise, in which he has served as a character designer and animation director on all of the theatrical movies.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Horidesk) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/horidesk/) | [Website](http://horidesk.m78.com)

Originating from Studio Pokke, currently freelance.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/浦上靖夫)

Founder of [Audio Planning U](https://anilist.co/studio/6561/), and the father of [Keiko](https://anilist.co/staff/162367/) and [Yasuyuki Urakami](https://anilist.co/staff/144509/).

In 2016, he received an Honorary Achievement Award for his role as a sound director in [Detective Conan](https://anilist.co/anime/235/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/suwacchi)

Michihiko is a producer, planner and supervisor. He is a chief producer at Yomiuri Telecasting Corporation.
